did.unittitle: William Bardsley Collection of United States National Recovery Administrations and National War Labor Board Printed and Mimeographed Documents, 1933-1945

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: United States. National War Labor Board (1918-1919)--Sources.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: William Bardsley Collection of United States National Recovery Administrations and National War Labor Board Printed and Mimeographed Documents #5699. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
